name: crimes_with_no_location
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool data_police_uk.
Tool description: This is the unofficial documentation for the Data.Police.UK API.
API description: Fetches a list of crimes from a specified police force on a given date and category, where the crimes have no specified location.

date.description: The date of the crimes to retrieve in 'YYYY-MM' format.

force.description: The identifier for the police force responsible for handling the crimes.

category.description: The category of the crimes to retrieve.
